short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance you e-commerce shopping and selling experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It provides quick access to important product information, such as product ranking, seller details, and shipping options, directly on the Amazon search page. 

With this extension, users can easily monitor the inventory and pricing of their favorite products, as well as track other sellers' listings. 

While some features are still in development and will be added in future updates, "E-Commerce Assistant" is a must-have tool for an shopper and seller looking to streamline their online shopping or selling experience.


[2023.03.29] New features in version 0.0.0.2 :
In the Amazon shopping site, drag an image at will, and a box will appear next to it. Drag and drop the picture into the box, and the operation of searching for pictures by pictures can be automatically completed on a goods source website.
